file_content.text: It's possible Arcann has a fail-safe in place to destroy Odessen.
The only way to ensure the planet's safety is to annihilate his ship.
I never planned on leaving the ship intact.
Way ahead of you.
Easier said than done.
Oh, is that all?
We're here to defeat Arcann. Don't get distracted by the pretty ship.
Stay focused on our goal.
I have a plan.
Normally I'd argue against needless destruction, but this time, you're on point.
That pretty ship has the firepower to destroy the Alliance Camp with or without Arcann.
While you and I head to the bridge, two strike teams will sabotage the flagship's guns and shields, leaving it vulnerable against the omnicannon.
I'm coming with you to face my children. That's not a request.
Then it's up to Torian and Gault. Who do you want to disable the guns?
Then it's up to Vette and Gault. Who do you want to disable the guns?
Then it's up to Torian and Vette. Who do you want to disable the guns?
Gault, I'm trusting you to take those guns offline. Permanently.
Gault.
Vette, your pirate days are about to come in handy.
Vette.
Sounds like a job for a Mandalorian.
Torian.
Trust me? Don't do that.
Relax--I'm joking! Sabotage the guns. How hard can it be?
Close quarters combat is more my style, but I'll go where you need me.
Big ships are easy to sneak around. Won't know I'm there until it's too late.
Torian, that leaves you in charge of the shields.
Vette, that leaves you in charge of the shields.
Gault, that leaves you in charge of the shields.
You know, the market for shield tech is booming.
My lucky day, I guess.
Commander--a minute?
As long as it's not three.
Never gonna live that down.
I'm really bad at this.
At what?
Saying thank you. This alliance has the potential to change the galaxy for the better.
Never been a part of something like that. Even on Zakuul.
Expressing my... feelings. With words. Let me start over.
You changed my life. In more ways than one. So before you run off into certain danger, I wanted to say thank you.
You've been a crucial member of the team since the beginning, Koth.
You played a major role.
This is only the beginning. The real work starts once Arcann's no longer a threat.
I'm just getting started.
Thank me when Arcann's dead.
We haven't won yet.
What's this--genuine sentiment? No crafted one-liners?
A bit out of character for you.
You've impacted my life more than you think.
I feel the same.
Keep your words. You know I prefer action.
Just kiss me.
Yeah, but it's your decisions that kept me around.
Don't forget SCORPIO. Can't make things too easy.
Despite everything that happened to you on Zakuul, you didn't turn your back on my people.
I'll never forget that.
Commander! We need to move.
We both know better than to keep her waiting.
Clearing a path to the hangar. Should be able to punch a hole in the shields so you can land.
Should?
Hey, nothing's one hundred percent.
Go. We'll cover you.
Ori'jate. It will be done.
Can't blame me for trying.
Oh, I know how important I am. You'd still be hanging on Arcann's wall if it wasn't for me. And Lana. But mostly me.
There's the Koth I love.
Hey--all of my one-liners are natural. No crafted nonsense.
Uh-huh.
Just come here.
